name: Mytholabe
description: The Mytholabe is a large construct designed for combat and support roles, featuring a durable build and the ability to fly and hover.
memorable: It has high magic resistance, can deafen enemies, and possesses an area effect that can neutralize conditions.
goals: Designed for combat effectiveness and support capabilities in battles.
relations: Can be associated with magical constructs or allies that rely on defensive tactics.
environment: Typically found in places where powerful constructs are created or in conflict zones.
strengths: Immunity to many conditions and damage types; can efficiently counter magical spells and abilities.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, leading to poor problem-solving and social skills.
attacks: Uses a multiattack to deliver three piercing and radiant damage strikes with heroic jabs.
most_powerful_ability: Purifying Resonance can neutralize conditions for allies and disrupt enemy concentration.
senses: Possesses passive Perception 13, providing decent awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Immutable Form prevents alteration by spells
Magic Weapons trait allows attacks to bypass certain resistances
Deafens nearby creatures when struck by nonmagical weapons
Can cast Plane Shift once per day for repositioning
spellcasting: Can innately cast Plane Shift on itself once per day using Wisdom.
test_queries: combat support construct with area effect
tactical flying construct that neutralizes effects
